item.title: About
item.description: I am an undergraduate student of physics at the National and Kapodistiran University of Athens. I enjoy going deeper into physics and using fundemental principles to derive the known laws of physics. This blog can bee seen as a journal of the things I look into outside the university courses and it is written so as to be accesible to any other undergraduate student.

item.title: Electrodynamics from First Principles
item.description: A step to step derivation of Maxwell’s equations for Electrodynamics starting from the principles of Relativity and Quantum Mechanics

item.title: (Hidden) Symmetries in Physics and the LRL vector
item.description: Constructing the formalism used to deal with symmetries in physics and applying it on the Laplace-Runge-Lenz vector.
